content.rendered:
Kusumlata Sheoran is Microsoft Certified Professional with Masters in Computing having completed AET-PTLLS from City and Guilds. She is teaching since 1994 and is passionate about teaching programming and databases.

She taught BSc (Hons) Final Year Top-Up Level 6 of Greenwich University from 2012 to 2016 the modules: Database Design, Web Application using Visual Studio 2005, 2013 using Ms-Access & SQL Server 2014, Programming Frameworks, Distributed Information Systems. In 2016 she actively coordinated with University of Greenwich as a Link Tutor along with teaching.

She has taught Computing courses from British Computer society at Certificate, Diploma and Postgraduate-Diploma levels along with ABE Advanced Diploma in Business Information Systems (Level 6) subjects: RDBMS and Principle of Programming. Currently involved in teaching HND in Computing since 2014.
